mapper.sql: userid, account, userpwd, temporarypwd, salt, username, phone, createTime, last_login_time, status, _id, wechat_id, wechat_code, wechat_name
mapper.select: select rolename from organization.u_roles where roleid in ( select roleid from u_users_roles where userid = (select userid from u_users where phone = #{phone}))
mapper.insert: insert into organization.u_users (userid, account, userpwd, temporarypwd, salt, username, phone, create_time, last_login_time, status, wechat_id, wechat_code, wechat_name) values (#{userid}, #{account},#{userpwd}, #{temporarypwd}, #{salt}, #{username}, #{phone}, #{createTime} #{lastLoginTime}, #{status}, #{wechatId}, #{wechatCode}, #{wechatName})

userid,

mapper.update:
update organization.u_users
account = #{account},
userpwd = #{userpwd},
temporarypwd = #{temporarypwd},
salt = #{salt},
username = #{username},
phone = #{phone},
create_time = #{createTime},
last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime},
status = #{status},
wechat_id = #{wechatId},
wechat_code = #{wechatCode},
wechat_name = #{wechatName},
where userid = #{userid}

update organization.u_users set account = #{account}, userpwd = #{userpwd}, temporarypwd = #{temporarypwd}, salt = #{salt}, username = #{username}, phone = #{phone}, create_time = #{createTime}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status}, wechat_id = #{wechatId}, wechat_code = #{wechatCode}, wechat_name = #{wechatName} where userid = #{userid}
